content: Quattro dei miei canti natalizi preferiti sono "Silent Night", "Joy to the World", "The First Noel" e "Away in the Manger".
translations: eng:Four of my favorite Christmas carols are Silent Night, Joy to the World, The First Noel and Away in the Manger
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
